statements: SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE destination = 'New York';
SELECT flight_id, destination, departure_time FROM flight_schedule WHERE flight_id = 1001;
SELECT destination, arrival_time FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT mission_plan FROM flight_schedule WHERE flight_id = 1002;
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE destination = 'New York'
SELECT flight_id, destination, departure_time FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_time DESC
SELECT flight_id, destination, arrival_time FROM flight_schedule WHERE arrival_time IS NULL
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE mission_plan LIKE '%emergency%'
SELECT flight_id, destination, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_schedule WHERE destination = 'Los Angeles' AND departure_time < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM flight_schedules;
SELECT flight_name, departure_date, departure_time FROM flight_schedules ORDER BY departure_date DESC, departure_time DESC;
SELECT flight_name, arrival_date, arrival_time FROM flight_schedules WHERE flight_id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, destination, launch_date FROM mission_plans ORDER BY launch_date;
SELECT flight_name, departure_date, departure_time, arrival_date, arrival_time FROM flight_schedules WHERE flight_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM flight_schedules WHERE departure_date > '2022-01-01' AND arrival_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT flight_name, departure_date, departure_time, arrival_date, arrival_time FROM flight_schedules ORDER BY departure_date DESC, departure_time DESC;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM mission_plans WHERE launch_location = 'SpaceX Launch Pad';
SELECT flight_name, arrival_date FROM flight_schedules WHERE departure_date = '2022-08-15' OR arrival_date = '2022-08-16';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_flights FROM flight_schedules WHERE departure_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules;
SELECT flight_id, departure_date, arrival_date FROM FlightSchedules WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM MissionPlans WHERE launch_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, start_time, end_time FROM Activities ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT mission_name, mission_description FROM MissionPlans WHERE destination = 'Mars';
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules;
SELECT departure_date, arrival_time FROM FlightSchedules WHERE flight_id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM MissionPlans WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, start_time, end_time FROM Activities ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT flight_id, departure_date, arrival_time FROM FlightSchedules WHERE departure_date < '2022-05-01' AND arrival_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules;
SELECT flight_id, departure_date, origin FROM FlightSchedules WHERE origin='USA';
SELECT spaceship_name, capacity FROM Spaceships WHERE status='Active' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT astronaut_name, nationality, age FROM Astronauts ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT mission_name, start_date, end_date, mission_status FROM MissionPlans WHERE mission_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules WHERE origin = 'New York' ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT flight_id, arrival_date, origin, destination FROM FlightSchedules WHERE departure_date > '2022-01-01' AND departure_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT origin, destination, COUNT(*) AS total_flights FROM FlightSchedules GROUP BY origin, destination HAVING total_flights > 5 ORDER BY total_flights DESC;

SELECT Astronauts.astronaut_name, Astronauts.nationality, MissionPlans.mission_name FROM Astronauts INNER JOIN MissionPlans ON Astronauts.astronaut_id = MissionPlans.mission_id WHERE Astronauts.experience_years > 5;
SELECT spaceship_id, spaceship_name, capacity, status FROM Spaceships WHERE capacity >= 50 AND status = 'active' ORDER BY spaceship_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM MissionPlans WHERE mission_type = 'Exploration';
SELECT crew_name, role FROM CrewMembers ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT * FROM Spaceships WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM Resources WHERE location = 'Mars';
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC, arrival_time ASC, origin_location, destination_location
SELECT flight_id, departure_time, arrival_time, status FROM FlightSchedules WHERE origin_location = 'Earth' AND status = 'Scheduled'
SELECT crew_id, crew_name, role, mission_name FROM CrewMembers JOIN MissionPlans ON CrewMembers.mission_assigned = MissionPlans.mission_id
SELECT spaceship_name, model, capacity FROM Spaceships ORDER BY capacity DESC, spaceship_name
SELECT resource_name, quantity, location FROM Resources WHERE location IN ('Mars', 'Venus')
